#include "bits/stdc++.h"
using namespace std;
bool visited[108];
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t,count,n,f,o,c,index;
	cin>>t;
	string s;
	while(t--)
	{
		count=0;
		cin>>s;
		n=s.length();
		for(int j=0;j<n;j++)
		visited[j]=0;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(s[i]=='(' || s[i]=='[' || s[i]=='{')
			{
			visited[i]=1;
			o=1,c=0,f=0;
			}
			for(int j=i+1;j<n;j++)
			{
				if(s[i]=='[')
				{
					if(s[j]==']' && !visited[j])
					{
					c++;
					index=j;
					}
					if(s[j]=='[')
					{
						o++;
					}
				}
				if(s[i]=='{')
				{
					if(s[j]=='}' && !visited[j])
					{
					c++;
					index=j;
					}
					if(s[j]=='{')
					{
						o++;
					}
				}
				if(s[i]=='(')
				{
					if(s[j]==')' && !visited[j])
					{
					c++;
					index=j;
					}
					if(s[j]=='(')
					{
						o++;
					}
				}
				if(c==o)
				{
					f=1;
					visited[index]=1;
					break;
				}
			}
			if(f==0)
			break;
			if(visited[i]==1)
			count++;
		}
		if(f==0 || count!=n)
		cout<<"no";
		else
		cout<<"yes";
		cout<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
